content.text: Doing well, I am a florist from the Pacific Northwest. What do you do for a living?
I am a web designer and I am single, but I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews.
I like playing soccer too! But I am a father and I don't have as much time to play as I used to.
I understand, my nieces and nephews are a lot of fun, but I also like my quiet time.
I enjoy my quiet time too, but I also love the chaos of being a father.
I am sure you do! I enjoy being around children, but I do not think I am ready to have any of my own.
That is okay, everyone is ready for children at their own pace.
I am glad you are enjoying your time as a father.
